description: There will be an important meeting on Thursday at 2:00 PM in the conference room. All team members are required to attend.
Please be informed that the office will be closed on Monday due to a public holiday. Enjoy your day off!
To show our appreciation for your hard work, we will be having an employee appreciation lunch on Friday at the rooftop cafeteria. Please RSVP by Wednesday.
There will be a training workshop on the latest software tools next Wednesday. Register on the HR portal.
We are renovating the office starting next week. Please be prepared for some temporary changes in workspace.
Join us in our annual charity drive. Let's make a positive impact on our community.
Our IT team will perform system maintenance on Friday night. Expect some downtime.
